Anyone have these for sale?


I still need 7 cards to complete the 1887 Detroit team set, Twitchell #490, Ganzel #493, Ganzel #494, Rowe #495, Hanlon #501, Brouthers # 504, and Watkins #507. 

I also collect the other Detroit cards, there are 8 others I need , Baldwin, Conway, Gilligan, McGlone, Rooks, Scheibeck, Wheelock and Deacon White. 

Joe Maples
